test-case.name: deleteMetadataThatDoesNotExistLeadsToNotFound
test-case.description: Ensures that DS metadata deletion request to API on an entity that does not exist results in NOT_FOUND.

test-case.name: getAssignedTargetsOfDistributionSetIsEmpty
test-case.description: Ensures that assigned targets of DS are returned as persisted in the repository.

test-case.name: assignMultipleTargetsToDistributionSet
test-case.description: Ensures that multi target assignment through API is reflected by the repository.

test-case.name: getAssignedTargetsOfDistributionSet
test-case.description: Ensures that assigned targets of DS are returned as reflected by the repository.

test-case.name: getDistributionSet
test-case.description: Ensures that single DS requested by ID is listed with expected payload.

test-case.name: getDistributionSetsWithPagingLimitRequestParameter
test-case.description: Ensures that DS in repository are listed with proper paging results with paging limit parameter.

test-case.name: getAutoAssignTargetFiltersOfDSWithInvalidFilter
test-case.description: Ensures that an error is returned when the query is invalid.

test-case.name: getSoftwaremodules
test-case.description: This test verifies the call of all Software Modules that are assiged to a Distribution Set through the RESTful API.

test-case.name: deleteFailureWhenDistributionSetInUse
test-case.description: This test verifies the deletion of a assigned Software Module of a Distribution Set can not be achieved when that Distribution Set has been assigned or installed to a target.

test-case.name: getEmptyAutoAssignTargetFiltersOfDistributionSet
test-case.description: Ensures that no target filters are returned according to the non matching query.

test-case.name: invalidRequestsOnDistributionSetsResource
test-case.description: Ensures that the server reacts properly to invalid requests (URI, Media Type, Methods) with correct reponses.

test-case.name: deleteDistributionSetThatDoesNotExistLeadsToNotFound
test-case.description: Ensures that DS deletion request to API on an entity that does not exist results in NOT_FOUND.

test-case.name: getDistributionSetsWithPagingLimitAndOffsetRequestParameter
test-case.description: Ensures that DS in repository are listed with proper paging results with paging limit and offset parameter.

test-case.name: deleteUnassignedistributionSet
test-case.description: Ensures that DS deletion request to API is reflected by the repository.

test-case.name: getSingleMetadata
test-case.description: Ensures that a metadata entry selection through API reflectes the repository content.

test-case.name: getMultipleAutoAssignTargetFiltersOfDistributionSet
test-case.description: Ensures that target filters with auto assign DS are returned according to the query.

test-case.name: getInstalledTargetsOfDistributionSet
test-case.description: Ensures that installed targets of DS are returned as persisted in the repository.

test-case.name: updateRequiredMigrationStepFailsIfDistributionSetisInUse
test-case.description: Ensures that DS property update on requiredMigrationStep fails if DS is assigned to a target.

test-case.name: unassignSoftwaremoduleFromDistributionSet
test-case.description: This test verifies the removal of Software Modules of a Distribution Set through the RESTful API.

test-case.name: updateDistributionSet
test-case.description: Ensures that DS property update request to API is reflected by the repository.

test-case.name: deleteAssignedDistributionSet
test-case.description: Ensures that assigned DS deletion request to API is reflected by the repository by means of deleted flag set.

test-case.name: getPagedListofMetadata
test-case.description: Ensures that a metadata entry paged list selection through API reflectes the repository content.

test-case.name: updateMetadata
test-case.description: Ensures that a metadata update through API is reflected by the repository.

test-case.name: assignmentFailureWhenAssigningToUsedDistributionSet
test-case.description: This test verifies that the assignment of a Software Module to a Distribution Set can not be achieved when that Distribution Set has been assigned or installed to a target.

test-case.name: filterDistributionSetComplete
test-case.description: Ensures that a DS search with complete==true parameter returns only DS that are actually completely filled with mandatory modules.

test-case.name: offlineAssignmentOfMultipleTargetsToDistributionSet
test-case.description: Ensures that offline reported multi target assignment through API is reflected by the repository.

test-case.name: createMetadata
test-case.description: Ensures that the metadata creation through API is reflected by the repository.

test-case.name: searchDistributionSetMetadataRsql
test-case.description: Ensures that a DS metadata filtered query with value==knownValue1 parameter returns only the metadata entries with that value.

test-case.name: searchDistributionSetAssignedTargetsRsql
test-case.description: Ensures that a DS assigned target search with controllerId==1 parameter returns only the target with the given ID.

test-case.name: assignSoftwaremoduleToDistributionSet
test-case.description: This test verifies the assignment of Software Modules to a Distribution Set through the RESTful API.

test-case.name: getAutoAssignTargetFiltersOfDistributionSet
test-case.description: Ensures that target filters with auto assign DS are returned as persisted in the repository.

test-case.name: searchDistributionSetRsql
test-case.description: Ensures that a DS search with query parameters returns the expected result.

test-case.name: deleteMetadata
test-case.description: Ensures that a metadata entry deletion through API is reflected by the repository.

test-case.name: createDistributionSets
test-case.description: Ensures that multipe DS posted to API are created in the repository.

test-case.name: getDistributionSets
test-case.description: Ensures that multiple DS requested are listed with expected payload.

test-case.name: getDistributionSetsWithoutAddtionalRequestParameters
test-case.description: Ensures that DS in repository are listed with proper paging properties.
